ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: it is truly a Decisive Word.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That this (Qur'an) is a decisive word
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: this (Qur'an) is surely a decisive Word,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: the Quran is the final word,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed the Qur’an is a decisive Word.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, this is the Word that separates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Most surely it is a decisive word,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: surely it is a decisive word;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! this (Qur'an) is a conclusive word,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It is surely a decisive utterance;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily, it is a discourse distinguishing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: it is indeed a conclusive discourse,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Behold this is the Word that distinguishes (Good from Evil):
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily! This (the Quran) is the Word that separates (the truth from falsehood, and commands strict legal laws for mankind to cut the roots of evil).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: this is indeed a Decisive Word,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, the Qur'an is a decisive statement,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [86:13] assuredly it, the Qur’ān, is a decisive word, distinguishing between truth and falsehood,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: This is the reason why Allah swore: (Lo! this (Qur'an) is a conclusive word) a true exposition; it is also said 747 this means: it is a judgement from Allah,
